sentences.en: She is perceived as vain, spoiled, and promiscuous.
sentences.cn: 她被认为是个虚荣、娇生惯养、淫乱的女人。

sentences.en: People are far more promiscuous, it seems, on foreign holidays.
sentences.cn: 在外国度假时，人们似乎会很更滥情。

sentences.en: From this promiscuous breed, that race now called Americans have arisen.
sentences.cn: 由这种混杂而繁衍产生了一个现叫作美国人的种族。
